name: Paleo Chocolate Mousse Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: unsweetened chocolate, coconut cream, all natural coconut milk, unprocessed organic honey, pure vanilla extract
recipeIngredient: 12 ounces additive/BPA-free organic coconut cream, refrigerated overnight
recipeInstructionSteps: In a small microwave-safe bowl, microwave chocolate on medium-high heat in 30-second intervals, stirring in between, until chocolate is melted. Let cool.
In a medium-size bowl, add the coconut cream, coconut milk, honey, and vanilla. Whisk until incorporated.
Divide evenly among ramekins. Refrigerate for 1 hour.
